title: My Monster In Law
overview: The sitcom revolves around Ms. Ái and her family. Ms. Ái, a retired woman, is waiting to meet her new daughter in law and her son Cường whom is studying abroad in the US to return to Vietnam. Heaven forbid, the daughter in law that Cường brought home is a man and not a gentle lady like what Ms. Ái has always expected. And from here, the "daughter in law" must live in the same house with the reluctant mother-in-law. The relationship around the family will create chaos situation that no one can predict...
